title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5306.4 - Duration of registration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5306.4 - Duration of registration

State Regulations
(a) Non-gaming registrations shall remain valid for five years unless suspended or
revoked. If a non-gaming registrant has not been employed in any position
within a gaming facility for a period of three years, the registration of that
non-gaming registrant shall lapse. (b) Each non-gaming registration shall
indicate an expiration date on the registration. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

New

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
